overview: After graduating from hairdressing school Cayla Lions and Vinna Red decided to set up a sexy salon that is like no other! The golden rule for the staff, keep the customer satisfied and that’s just what teen trainee Lady Bug does! Private’s finest pair of high maintenance hunnies attend to have all their needs met, Alexis Crystal opens out both holes to endure some delightful DP while the busty blonde Blanche Bradburry rocks up to the salon for her anal fix! This XXX Hair Salon is the place to be for any star looking for some tender grooming, or even just a hardcore ass slamming. One thing is for sure, you can’t afford to miss it!
title: XXX Hair Salon
